snippet: Mr. Chinaglia came to the New York Cosmos professional soccer team as one of Europe’s greatest goal scorers, then attracted almost as much attention for his impenitent candor.
abstract: Giorgio Chinaglia, Italian soccer star who played for the New York Cosmos professional soccer team, dies at age 65.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Chinaglia came to the New York Cosmos professional soccer team as one of Europe’s greatest goal scorers, then attracted almost as much attention for his impenitent candor.

headline.seo: Giorgio Chinaglia, Italian Star and the Cosmos’ Leader, Dies at 65
headline.main: Giorgio Chinaglia, Italian Star and the Cosmos’ Leader, Dies at 65
headline.print_headline: Giorgio Chinaglia, 65, Italian Star And the Cosmos’ Leader, Is Dead
